rationale: The species has a wide distribution in the several river basins in Thailand, Cambodia,  Viet Nam, and Lao PDR. Although it has some threats (including over-fishing and harvesting for the aquarium trade), it is assessed as Least Concern at present. Populations should be monitored for declines, and impacts from future mainstream dams should be looked for.
evaluator: Rainboth, W., Ng, H.H., Kullander, S.O. & Juffe Bignoli, D.
